channel.title: Making money in internet!?
channel.description:
Hi, i have heard that people get paid by surfing in internet and posting all kind of links and other stuff. So, is it possible to make money by just adding links to your sites/posts? I mean when someone click your link, you get little amount of money? Is it safe, and do i get trash mail if i do this? Can someone help, and tell me about this way to make money?
Thank you.
~Tarantula

item.title: Making money in internet!?
item.dc:creator: @Tarantula Tarantula
item.description:
@Tarantula wrote:

This is so complicated and i have bad english! I dont know what to do, i have made paypal, cashcrate and clicksor account + new website for google ads and i have no idea what to do now! How do i complete offers? Oh my god this is hard!

Btw, free money! —> http://www.cashcrate.com/index.php?ref=36304 ;D[br][size=1]Posted at: June 08, 2006, 07:17:33 am[/size][hr]Oh man, i cant have google ads because of i am underage

Read full topic

item.title: Making money in internet!?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Like I said above, in my signiture at kaitnieks forums, I asked for people to go to a site and click on the ads for me. Let me tell you, it went really well. This was before the big craze of referral links and such so people didn’t mind seeing it. It was a looong time ago. Anyways, don’t ask me how, but google saw my signiture on kaitnieks forums while they were doing a checkup to make sure kait’s site(since he had ads too) followed the rules. I was pretty suprised. And I’ve tried everything to get back into google ads, they pay like 2 or 3 more times then clicksor.

Read full topic

item.title: Making money in internet!?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

yna, that was the old days. The site is long gone.
Our ads are now on afelhem.com

I’m banned from google, forever.
It really does baffle me:
First of all, how the heck did they find out about my signiture on kaitnieks forums? And second of all, how did they know it was me when I tried to sign Afelhem up for google ads. I had a different IP address, a different email, I used my grandma’s home address, and they still knew it was me. How the heck is that possible?
Clicksor takes around a week for approval. Btw, make a phony site about lawyers and stuff, you can get quite a bit of cash The ads are soley based off of keywords.
Tarantula, www.clicksor.com

Read full topic

@jme wrote:

It worked on my tripod site, so why not?

Google will send a cheque to your house when you achieve 100 dollars. Clicksor will pay through paypal however and you wont get banned, but you wont make as much money.

item.title: Making money in internet!?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Google ads are hard to keep though, they are like a banning machine. I had ads on my site, and they saw my signiture on kaitnieks forums asking to click on them, and they banned me. They even quoted the sig for me. I was like, whaaaaaaaahhhh… How the hell did they know?

Clicksor on the other hand, doesn’t give a flying crap. Tell people to click several times a day and clicksor wont mind(Their making money, your making money, everyone is happy). But dont forget that you are stealing that money from business’es. They have to pay out money for each click. All you need to do is put a simple html code on your site and tell people to click on the ads and you’ll make several cents each click. On my fake website to do this(It was based on advertising), I got as much as 60 cents per click sometimes.

Read full topic

item.title: Making money in internet!?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Tarantula, post:16, topic:3642”]Hmm… It sounds like, that only treasure troopers really pay.

  1. But how they pay for me if i dont have credit card?
  2. Without credit card i cant make paypal account?
  3. Without paypal account i cant make treasure troopers account?

So… How i get paid if i dont have credit card?[/quote]
1.) They dont even pay by credit card, they send you a cheque in the mail.
2.) You dont need anything to join paypal, just an email address. If you want to get a Verified(pointless, really) then you need a credit card and bank account.
3.) Yes you can.

Surf Junky is a SCAM!Yeah, so you like Surf Junky. You won't like it any more when you reach a ... Once you get to that amount of money, Surf Junky will mark your account for ... merkey.net/surfjunky/

item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Yeah. I just checked out the treasure thing and it was such a waste of time. Took forever to fill out some stupid survey and I onlyg ot paid 50 cents for it. What a load of bullshit.

If only one of us can make an autoer that would fill out the information and we wouldn’t have to sit through this crap.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Making money in internet!?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Just keep in mid there is almost no easy way to make (very much) money. If there was then everyone would be rich and there would be no real economy or jobs.

From my experience, all I know that pays out is treasure trooper(made 24 dollars but I got bored of it quicly), clicksor(got 40 dollars quickly), storm of cash(Dont get much, but all you do is click on links. You can use the little money you make to buy credits so other people click on your website link.) and google ads do work, but they are not stupid. They’ll ban you if their the least bit suspicious. Search google for what I listed. If you only want a little bit of money, take up 3d modelling and sell some models. Post your LOWPOLY models on forums and sell a large pack of them for cheap. Just by making like 20 differnt simple shapes(fences, poles, anything usable by game developers) you could sell them for like 5 dollars a pack, and sometimes you can get as many as 10 sales. 50 dollars in like 2 or 3 hours isnt bad.

Read full topic
